typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		date as date,
		duration as integer,
		worker_id as long,
		sector_id as long,
		task_id as long,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		user_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		date,
		duration,
		worker_id,
		sector_id,
		task_id,
		created_at,
		updated_at,
		user_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
